TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pukpuk, title = Pukpuk, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pukpuk} }

S.FORM: Pukpuk Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Pukpuk a niyaro', 2,688 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 6,978 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 18% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 1,245 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 82% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5,733 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis15%, Truku1%, Bunun0.5%, Tayal0.5%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.

Pokpok Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Pokpok a niyaro', 2,688 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 6,978 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 18% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 1,245 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 82% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5,733 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis15%, Troko1%, Bonon0.5%, Tayal0.5%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.
